Rounds :

This event has two rounds on the whole:


Round 1:

❖ Objective type questions based on General Knowledge.


❖ In Prelims, there will be forty five questions and each question have one marks.


❖ Time: 45 mins.


Round 2:

In final round, Participants should find the treasure using clues and the winner selection will based on first come first serve.


Rules:

❖ Two teams can participate from one college.


❖ Each team can be comprised of 4 members.


❖ Using mobile phones are prohibited and any malpractice during in it that will be lead your team disqualified.


❖ The Top scorers in prelims will be select for next level.


❖ Map will be provided for participants in the second round for finding clues.


❖ Participants should maintain discipline inside the college campus.


❖ Cheating will not be tolerated at any means.


❖ Those who are arguing with event head or members or other team members will lead to be disqualified.



Our Vision

Bishop Heber College, A great Institution of higher education set in beautiful surroundings, seeks to function through mutual love and respect and with efficiency and creativity, catering to the educational needs of all, especially the poor, the needy and the under-privileged, inspired by the love of our Lord Jesus Christ.
